name: Eggs & Bacon Demo
description:
Eggs & Bacon is a classic game for your Windows PC!

Play with friends or alone, Eggs & Bacon is a game where you stack eggs & bacon onto your glass plate. Relive your fun breakfast childhood with Eggs & Bacon. Up to 20 can play! It's fun, addictive, and best of all it's free of charge! So many fun levels for all!

In Eggs & Bacon, you never know where you'll end up. You just know that you'll be having eggs & bacon. It's a really fun game.

Get it on Windows now for you to enjoy!

Disclaimer: Eggs & Bacon™ is property of ChilliWaffles and the aforementioned Eggs & Bacon™ is not to be infringed on in any way at all. Infringing on Eggs & Bacon™ can result in legal fees. Enjoy :)
